brand.name: NR Rapisardi
brand.ethicalInfo1: NR Rapisardi is a shoe label based in the heart of Florence that uses the finest plant-based materials.
brand.ethicalInfo2:
NR Rapisardi's environment rating is 'not good enough'. It does not publish sufficient relevant information about its environmental policies to give a higher rating. As a shopper you have the right to know how its production practices impact on the environment.

Its labour rating is 'not good enough'. Its final stage of production is undertaken in Italy, a medium risk country for labour abuse. There is no evidence it audits any of its supply chain. There is no evidence it ensures payment of a living wage in its supply chain. There is no evidence it investigates and reports on safety incidents.

Its animal rating is 'great'. It states that its entire product range is vegan.

NR Rapisardi is rated 'It's a start' overall.
brand.positiveText: Dear NR Rapisardi, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear NR Rapisardi, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.
